name: OS X Gather Mac OS X Password Hash Collector
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
hammackj <jacob.hammack@hammackj.com>
joev <joev@metasploit.com>
description:
This module dumps SHA-1, LM, NT, and SHA-512 Hashes on OSX. Supports
            versions 10.3 to 10.14.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: MATCHUSER
options.description: Only attempt to grab hashes for users whose name matches this regex
